member.name: T:AppliedSystems.Messaging.Messages.IEvent
member.summary: Marks a message that represents a completed action. Must be added to any event classes in order to be dispatched or handled by the infrastructure.
member.remarks: Usually these are named in the past tense e.g.OrderPlaced, and contrasts with other message types such as command which represents an action to execute, and request and response which represent a query for information and the resulting information returned
